definitions.title: n.[f.] pl.
definitions.body: gourds (wild cucumbers, citrullus colocynthis, with purgative properties, acc. to Post:Hastings DB ii. 250 De:Ri HWB 278 f. LXX kolokunqiv; > momordica (or ecballium) elaterium, which is not a vine; cf. Syr. pquw9o0, fruit of colocynthis (or the similar cucumis prophetarum, Löw:l. c. Brock);—cstr. [[שָׂדֶה]] ´[[פ]] 2Ki 4:39.
